name: Super Miner Clone Bros.
description:
This game bring you back to CHILDHOOD! Play as the Super Miner who needs to clone himself and step on his brothers to pave the way and get through to the next portal. This is a old school arcade style game to pass time and offers a casual mental challenge.

Guide:Use the arrow keys to move and jump around and use the MAGIC skill+ button to do some creative thinking to make it to the end of the levels.

The key to pass the level is a way of "level maker" thinking. Remember that!

Thanks for playing!
